scripts.clean:node_modules: lerna exec -- rm -rf ./node_modules && lerna exec -- rm -ff ./yarn.lock && rm -rf ./node_modules
scripts.build:artifacts: npm run clean:dist && npm run build && npm run build:engine && npm run build:helpers && npm run build:compiler
scripts.build:engine: lerna exec --scope raptor-engine  -- 'npm run build:dist' && cp ./packages/raptor-engine/dist/* ./dist/
scripts.build:helpers: lerna exec --scope babel-helpers-raptor  -- 'npm run build' && cp ./packages/babel-helpers-raptor/dist/* ./dist/
scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('yarn')===-1) throw new Error('npm is not supported, instead use \"yarn install\"')"
